title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Blockbuster Tony Bobulinski interview on Fox. Biden knew everything about Hunter's business. The Bidens tried to get around Russian sanctions to make deal with the Chinese. Media blackout on Bobulinski interviews including WSJ. Biden campaign warning media outlets they'll be blacklisted if they report on the story. Biden corruption is why Trump was elected. Chinese wanted to be in business to blackmail Biden, FBI sat on Hunter Biden laptop to blackmail Biden. Tech CEOs testify. Rush's new Twitter handle still hasn't gotten blue checkmark. MSNBC reports they found only one Biden voter out of 50 in Arizona. IBD/TIPP poll tightens one week out, as Rush predicted, Trend is toward Trump. Rush tweets video of his analysis of the Victor Davis Hanson sound bite from yesterday about what conservatives look for in judges. ABC/WaPo poll showing Biden up 17 in Wisconsin is a voter suppression poll meant to dispirit you, polls are almost identical to 2016 in Wisconsin, Hillary was way ahead and Trump won. Pennsylvania caller thinks Trump will win big. Biden visits place where FDR went to die, speaks before record crowd of 300-plus in Georgia.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Frank Luntz says when Dodgers win World Series, GOP wins White House. Luntz changing his tune on how Trump could win? Biden lectures to wear a mask. Biden's big day in Georgia: Speaks in front of crowd of 365 cars, goes to place FDR went to die. Who are the early voters? MSNBC says they found only one Biden voter out of 50 they interviewed in Arizona. If you're serious about draining the swamp, you cannot vote for Joe Biden. Bobulinski interview exposed how dirty Biden is. The media stopped the country over the Christine Blasey Ford allegations, but ignores Bobulinski allegations. Biden has not denied any of the corruption allegations. If you were accused of this kind of corruption and it wasn't true, wouldn't you deny it?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Why isn't Biden using the media to deny the allegations? Podesta says he's stressed out over the election, but convinced the Comey letter is why Hillary lost. Ted Cruz grills Jack Dorsey. Dorsey sporting nose ring and Rasputin beard. Report from Trump rally in Michigan. There is no plan for unity after the election because it's not possible. The left is not interested in unity. They hate you, think you're all white supremacists and they want to make you miserable. Trump on verge of calling out National Guard in Philadelphia. GOP team of lawyers ready to fight fraud. If Trump wins, he'll push to crack down harder on rioting, but Democrat governors still have to ask for his help. Caller on Long Island Trump car rally.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
